recipesJson.name: Berliner
recipesJson.author: MrBurgundy
recipesJson.description:
Custard cream donut filling with just a little hint of the actual donut in there. Grown-up fat kids rejoice.

Custard Premium and Vanilla Buttercream Frosting make a thick, creamy, and sweet base with a hint of vanilla. Zeppola adds a touch of donut and some spice lingering throughout. Itâ€™s loaded with Super Sweet for the sugary sweetness youâ€™d expect from donut filling.

Itâ€™s pretty good fresh, but everything is better steeped.

Happy mixing. ğŸ‘½

reviews.text: This is the best custard:donut blend Iâ€™ve had. Tastes premium ğŸ‘ğŸ¼ Canâ€™t wait to see what else you have in store, great job!

How this one doesn't have more reviews is beyond me. Knocked this one out of the park. If you like custard donuts and havent tried this one yet you are really cheating yourself. I love it as is and also with a a drop of rich cinnamon per 30 ml added to go more in the cinnamon direction. Mix this one up guys and gals.
This is fantastic MrBurgandy!  A very nice subtle donut with a great custardy filling.
